title: Drawing, "Sketchbook Page: Two Landscapes after Vincenzo Martinelli; Verso: Architectural Details", 1811–14

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketchbook Page: Two Landscapes after Vincenzo Martinelli; Verso: Architectural Details", 1811–14.
1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2432.
